alert.note: Alert for Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; McMinn; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradley, Polk, southern McMinn and southeastern Hamilton Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1113 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Charleston to Ringgold. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Benton, Etowah, Charleston, South Cleveland, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale and Calhoun. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for east Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; McMinn; West Polk
